content: If we want to stick with the recommended V3 ActEncounterCode Value Set what should we do when the Encounter class is truly unknown?

Itâ€™s a FHIR question. The specification for Encounter.class says to use the V3 ActEncounterClass.
```quote
Is this a CDA related question?

The binding is Extensible. "If there is no applicable concept in value set (based on human review), an alternate concept (either system/code pair, or text) may be used instead. " I think a good candidate is Data-Absent-Reason value set: http://hl7.org/fhir/valueset-data-absent-reason.html
